entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
